text: hananim-eun neohui eon-yagbodaneun neohuiui uidowa ma-eum-eul gyesanhasinila geuui sogjoelosseo yeolmyeong-ui bulssanghan ja-ege eumsig-eul daejeobhala ineun neo hui gajogdeul-i meogneun eumsig-ila ttohan geudeul-ege ib-eul os-eul jugo noyeleul haebangsikyeo juneun geosdo doenani man-il geuleohji moshal gyeong-ueneun sam-ilgan dan sig-eul hala geugeos-i naega eon-yaghan sogjoeinila geuleona neohui eon-yag-eun ji kyeoya haneuni igeos-i neohuiege gye sihan hananim-ui malsseum-ini neohuineun gamsahala
